moves.name: Crunch
moves.effect: Has a small chance of lowering the target’s Defense.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.effect: The user also takes 25% of the damage it dealt to the target.

moves.name: Rawr!
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s Speed. Radically raises the user’s Speed if the user is affected by a status condition. Sharply raises the user’s critical-hit rate. Lowers the user’s Defense and Sp. Def.

passives.name: Carry On 1
passives.description: Raises the user’s Attack each time another Pokémon on the field of play faints.

passives.name: Spur On 4
passives.description: Charges the user’s move gauge by four each time another Pokémon on the field of play faints.
